p: Myrtenal is a monoterpene present in many medicinal plants such as cumin, pepper, mint, and eucalyptus. Monoterpenes consist of two isoprene units. They naturally occur in plants and essential oils. They are antioxidant, anticancer, antidiabetic, and act as cyclooxygenase-inhibitors and immunostimulants [ 4, 56, 57, 58, 59, 60].
